data.title: Service Discontinuation Notice
data.text:
We regret to inform you that our free phpBB forum hosting service has been discontinued as of June 30, 2024.

If you are interested in migrating to our paid hosting service or have any questions, please contact us at billing@hostonnet.com.

Paid hosting plans start at $20 per year with a $10 setup/migration fee. We strive to provide affordable hosting solutions for your needs.

Thank you for your understanding and support.
